content.text: Match ends, West Bromwich Albion 3, Crystal Palace 2.
Second Half ends, West Bromwich Albion 3, Crystal Palace 2.
Foul by Saido Berahino (West Bromwich Albion).
Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mile Jedinak (Crystal Palace).
James McClean (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Goal!  West Bromwich Albion 3, Crystal Palace 2. Connor Wickham (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the top right corner following a set piece situation.
